about_the_game:
The Soundtrack to Runes of Pandemonium, composed by DurrDiss. This download includes all of the custom-made music for the game in their original high-quality versions. You will also receive new tracks as they are released.

Proceeds from sales of the soundtrack are shared between DurrDiss and the Bottled Starlight studio to help fund development of the game (and the creation of more music!).

Note that the soundtrack does not include sound files from third parties. Information about those tracks can be found in the Credits.txt document, provided in the main game's download.
